SEARCH

Class CreditCardIssuer

java.lang.Object
CreditCardIssuer
public class CreditCardIssuer extends Object
This class holds an array of CC issuer names provided in the Assignment Instructions and the count of those CC issuer names. Initialization: If a CC issuer name is provided to the constructor, the CreditCardIssuer object will hold the information provided in the Assignment Instructions for that specific CC issuer. If a CreditCardIssuer object is provided to the constructor, the CreditCardIssuer object will copy the fields of the given CreditCardIssuer object. Also, this class provides getter methods for all fields. Class: Fall - COSC 1437.81301 Assignment: Final Project Date: 12/5/2023
Version:
0.0.0
Author:
Avalon Matthew

  • Constructor Details

    • CreditCardIssuer

      public CreditCardIssuer(String issuerName)
      Constructor for CreditCardIssuer class. Initializes name with the provided parameter. Then, validIINs, minLength, and maxLength are all initialized with predetermined values (given in the Assignment Instructions) based on the value of name.
      Parameters:
      Name - of the CC issuer as String

    • CreditCardIssuer

      public CreditCardIssuer(CreditCardIssuer issuer)
      Copy constructor for CreditCardIssuer class. Initializes name, validIINs, minLength, and maxLength with the associated fields of the provided CreditCardIssuer.
      Parameters:
      CC - issuer to be copied as CreditCardIssuer
